text:
Presence of an ANM for conducting the delivery
/circle6 Th  e Maternal and Child Protection Card (for complete information regarding the 
antenatal period)
/circle6 Clean towels/cloth for drying and wrapping the baby
/circle6 Clean clothes that have been washed and sun-dried for the mother and the baby
/circle6 Sanitary pads/clean cloth for the mother
/circle6 Supplies like Inj. Oxytocin, Tab. Misoprostol, Cord Clamps, Sterile Surgical Knife with 
Blade, Paediatric size Bag and Mask and other e
